text:
Leading social and chat app, MeetMe is looking for Devs to join our team!

Here at MeetMe we have an office full of passionate developers who get to work on a thriving mobile application while creating new native stand alone apps, participate in company hackathons, and even take breaks to play video games on the big screen in our fully stocked kitchen.

Currently Open: Software Engineer Sr. Android Developer / Architect Sr. iOS Developer / Architect Network Engineer

Check out all descriptions: https://hire.jobvite.com/j?bj=onHUYfwG&s=HackerNews Email: achiazza@meetme.com for more info.
